fields.headline: Best offers
fields.bodyText: Under £200 France: Book by February 28 for travel until March 16 and a day-trip to Paris plus gourmet lunch at either Terence Conran's Alcazar, Brasseries Flo, Julien and Bofinger or Terminus Norda costs £80pp with Eurostar Holidays Direct (0870 1676767), including return standard class travel on Eurostar and a two-course lunch with one beverage and coffee. An upgrade to three courses costs an additional £5pp. Salisbury: Until February 28, Milford Hall Hotel is offering two nights' weekend half-board for £91pp (about a third off). Classic British Hotels (0845 0707090, Monday-Friday 8.30am-6pm, quoting 'Winter 5% Plus' or visit classicbritishhotels.com). France: For departures until March 15, Crystal France (0870 8880233, crystalfrance.co.uk) is offering three nights' B&B for the price of two at the Hotel Utrillo in Montmartre in Paris for £135pp (two sharing), including return Dover-Calais ferry crossing for a car and two passengers. France: Until February 13, two nights' B&B at the four-star Carlton Hotel in Lille costs from £139pp including direct Eurostar travel from Waterloo or Ashford and nil-excess personal travel insurance. VFB Holidays (01242 240310, vfbholidays.co.uk). Tunisia: Departing January 22, 14 nights in Tunisia costs £199pp (saving £99) including Gatwick flights. Cheapest Flights (0871 7501788, cheapestflights.co.uk). Under £400 Majorca: For departures until February15, three nights' B&B at the three-star Tryp Palma Hotel in Palma costs from £239pp (saving £104) including British Airways scheduled flights from Gatwick. Thomas Cook Signature (0870 4434449). Spain: Departing January 24, Cresta Holidays (0870 3333303, crestaholidays.co.uk) is offering four nights' B&B for the price of three at the two-star Meson Castilla in Barcelona. £282pp (two sharing) including Gatwick flights. Gozo: Departing January 21 or 28, Meon Villas (01730 268411, meonvillas.co.uk) has seven nights' self-catering at the Villa Orchidea from £299pp (five sharing) saving £147, including Gatwick flights, car hire and maid service. France skiing: Departing January 18 or 19, Esprit Ski (01252 618300, esprit-holidays.co.uk) has seven nights' catered chalet accommodation (with six nights' dinner and wine) at Sapinière, Chamonix, for £299 per adult (saving £180), and a week at Puy St Vincent for £199 per adult (saving £150), both including flights from Stansted. Children receive a discount of up to 75% depending on age. Five mornings' supervised ski/snow play costs from £110 per child. Hungary: For departures until March 28, Kirker Holidays (020-7231 3333, kirkerholidays.com) is offering four nights' B&B for the price of three at the four-star K+K Opera hotel in Budapest From £375pp including scheduled flights, return car transfers and Kirker's restaurant and sightseeing guide. France skiing: Snowcoach (01727 866177) is offering two 'buy one, get one free' deals. A 10-day (seven-night) holiday departing January 17 at Val Cenis now costs £388 for two people including coach travel from a choice of pick-up points and half-board accommodation at the Club Hotel Alpazur. A week's flight-inclusive package departing Gatwick on January 18 costs £457 per couple. Caribbean sailing: STA Tall Ships Adventures (023 9283 2055, sta.org.uk) is offering half-price on 10- and 11-night full-board tall-ship voyages around the Grenadines and Windward Islands, departing Barbados on January 27 for £399pp. Flights from Gatwick to Barbados extra, available from £395pp. No previous experience required. Under £1,000 Egypt: Departing February 3 or 10, Hayes & Jarvis (0870 8989890, hayesandjarvis.co.uk) has a seven-night full-board Nile cruise for £449pp (two sharing) saving £126, including Gatwick flights and transfers. Canary Islands: VIP v illas in Caleta de Fuste in Fuerteventura sleep six and for the week from January 22 costs a total of £599 (saving £300). Car hire available from £119 per week with pick up from the airport. Flights extra. Solmar Villas (0870 3813000, solmarvillas.com). Malaysia: Between February 8 and March 20, Travelmood (08700 664556, travelmood.com) has 10 nights in Kuala Lumpur and Penang from £599pp, including Malaysia Airlines flights from Heathrow or Manchester and transfers. Must be booked by January 15. South Africa: For departures from April 21-July 10, Travelbag (0870 8901461, travelbag.co.uk) has five nights at the Palm Garden Hotel in Cape Town for £609pp including BA flights from Heathrow. Sri Lanka: Departing January 22, American Express Travel (0870 6001060) has seven nights' B&B at the Bentota Beach Hotel from £739pp (saving £132) including Heathrow flights. Over £1,000 Mauritius: For January 20-February 12 departures, British Airways Holidays (0870 4434430, baholidays.co.uk) has seven nights' half-board at the five-star Hilton from £1,199pp (saving up to £330) including BA scheduled flights from Heathrow.
